<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/81369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dangerous Creatures and Rainforests</string>
            <string language="es">Criaturas peligrosas y selvas tropicales</string>
            <string language="ga">Créatúir Dháinséaracha agus Foraoiseacha Báistí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefährliche Geschöpfe und Rainforests</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créatures et Forêts tropicales dangereuses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criaturas perigosas e Rainforests</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creature pericolose e Rainforests</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επικίνδυνα πλάσματα και τροπικά δάση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable worksheet which can be completed in conjunction with Microsoft's Dangerous Creatures CD-ROM.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que se puede imprimir, se puede cumplimentar utilizando el CD-ROM de Dangerous Creatures de Microsoft.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre inphriontáilte ar féidir a úsáid i gcomhair le CD-ROM Microsoft Dangerous Creatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">TCF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbarer Bogen, der in Verbindung mit 
Microsoft gefährlicher Geschöpfe CD-ROM durchgeführt werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau imprimable qui peut être rempli en même
temps que le CD-ROM dangereux des créatures de Microsoft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha printable que pode ser terminada 
conjuntamente com o CD-ROM perigoso das criaturas de Microsoft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro stampabile che può essere 
completato insieme con il CD-ROM pericoloso delle creature del 
Microsoft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο φύλλο εργασίας που μπορεί να ολοκληρωθεί 
από κοινού με το επικίνδυνο CD-*ROM πλασμάτων της 
Microsoft.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>

          <identifier>

            <entry>4609</entry>

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)

END:VCARD</entity>

        <educational>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>

FN:John O'Mahony
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
